title: The Draymond Green Show - Warriors Up 2-0 and a Rant About NBA Award Voting
itunes:title: The Draymond Green Show - Warriors Up 2-0 and a Rant About NBA Award Voting
description:
On 'The Draymond Green Show' Dray discusses why the Warriors being up 2-0 on the Nuggets means "absolutely nothing", how Jordan Poole's ascension has changed the Warriors, the problem with NBA award voting, the amazing Celtics/Nets series, and his standout playoff performers through two games. #Herd

Produced by: Jackson Safon

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
